description: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = number of closed meander systems of order n with k<=n components.
comments: A meander of order n has 2n bridges. For many more references, see A005315 and A005316.
links: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..210
P. Di Francesco, O. Golinelli and E. Guitter, Meander, folding and arch statistics, arXiv:hep-th/9506030, 1995.
I. Jensen, Enumeration of plane meanders, arXiv:cond-mat/9910313 [cond-mat.stat-mech], 1999.
M. La Croix, Approaches to the Enumerative Theory of Meanders [_Gerald McGarvey_, Oct 26 2008]
S. K. Lando and A. K. Zvonkin, Plane and projective meanders, Theoretical Computer Science Vol. 117 (1993) p. 232.
crossrefs: Columns include A005315, A006657, A006658. Diagonals include A000108 (Catalan numbers), A006659, A007746. Row sums are in A001246.
author: D. Ivanov, S. K. Lando, A. K. Zvonkin ( LabRI, Bordeaux, France).
extensions: More terms from Pab Ter (pabrlos(AT)yahoo.com), May 10 2004
